Your_progress_in: The growth of your rewards stems from your total bets across our cassino games and sportsbook offerings. As you ascend through the various levels, you'll gain acess to increasingly valuable perks and benefits, enriching your gaming journey.
All_bets:
Every settled wager in the sportsbook
 contributes to a progression rate that is three times faster. Bets that are nullified or voided do not count towards this accelerated growth.
In_order_to_move:
In order to move to the next level and get the
next rank, you need to have a wagered amount
more than indicated in the "Wager Amount".
